video.title: Marvel's Luke Cage
video.synopsis: A hoodie-wearing, unbreakable ex-con fights to clear his name and save his neighborhood. He wasn't looking for a fight, but the people need a hero.

episodes.synopsis: With tension building in the streets of Harlem thanks to ruthless club owner Cottonmouth, Luke finds it increasingly difficult to live a quiet life.
episodes.title: Moment of Truth

episodes.synopsis: Luke is pulled deeper into the fight for his neighborhood when, as a favor to an old friend, he tries to help a kid who's in trouble with Cottonmouth.
episodes.title: Code of the Streets

episodes.synopsis: In the aftermath of a chaotic event at a favorite Harlem hangout, Luke heeds the call to action -- and hits Cottonmouth where he'll feel it most.
episodes.title: Who's Gonna Take the Weight?

episodes.synopsis: As he rescues a victim of Cottonmouth's vengeance, Luke remembers his earlier life and the conspiracy that led to his superhuman strength.
episodes.title: Step in the Arena

episodes.synopsis: Cottonmouth strikes back at Luke by taking his vengeance out on the people of Harlem, while detectives Knight and Scarfe face an unexpected threat.
episodes.title: Just to Get a Rep

episodes.synopsis: After Cottonmouth and Scarfe's bloody clash, Luke realizes that saving the community may turn former allies into enemies, and enemies into allies.
episodes.title: Suckas Need Bodyguards

episodes.synopsis: Mariah's political career comes under fire, and Cottonmouth picks up information that could put Luke on the run.
episodes.title: Manifest

episodes.synopsis: Mariah campaigns to turn the city and the police against Luke, and not even Misty or Claire may be able to save him.
episodes.title: Blowin' Up the Spot

episodes.synopsis: With Luke wounded and on the run, Misty faces a soul-searching interrogation. Mariah's rise to power takes a dark turn.
episodes.title: DWYCK

episodes.synopsis: Luke gets closer to the truth about Reva and her part in his fate, while Mariah wrestles with the morality of her new role. Misty hunts for Luke.
episodes.title: Take It Personal

episodes.synopsis: In one bold move, a friend from his past puts Luke on the defensive, Misty in dire straits, and Harlem's safety in jeopardy.
episodes.title: Now You're Mine

episodes.synopsis: Misty digs deeper for the truth as the neighborhood's power players throw the city into confusion.
episodes.title: Soliloquy of Chaos

episodes.synopsis: With all of Harlem bearing witness, Luke takes on the fight of his life in hopes of emerging as the defender his city needs.
episodes.title: You Know My Steez

episodes.synopsis: As Luke adjusts to his growing fame and tries to shut down the flow of heroin branded with his name, someone from his past reaches out.
episodes.title: Soul Brother #1

episodes.synopsis: Luke tests out his abilities on the ballfield, Misty ruffles feathers at the precinct, and Mariah plans a reunion to boost her image.
episodes.title: Straighten It Out

episodes.synopsis: Worried Luke is headed down a dark path, Claire pays a visit to his father. Bushmaster makes a bid for Mariah's guns.
episodes.title: Wig Out

episodes.synopsis: As footage of his fight with Bushmaster goes viral, Luke struggles with the aftereffects and follows a trail of clues to Tilda's shop.
episodes.title: I Get Physical

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to drum up quick cash for a lawsuit, Luke weighs an offer from a superfan. Mariah invites Tilda to join the new family business.
episodes.title: All Souled Out

episodes.synopsis: As a wave of violence rocks Harlem, everyone races to connect the dots between Piranha, Mariah, Bushmaster and the grisly find at the clinic.
episodes.title: The Basement

episodes.synopsis: Reeling from the showdown on the bridge, Luke teams up with Misty to find Piranha. The hunt for the snitch heats up. Bushmaster reveals his endgame.
episodes.title: On and On

episodes.synopsis: While Shades, Mariah and Misty come to terms with the previous night's events, Bushmaster searches for a way to boost his strength.
episodes.title: If It Ain't Rough, It Ain't Right

episodes.synopsis: Hunkered down in a makeshift safe house, Luke and Misty butt heads over how to handle Mariah. Meanwhile, long-buried family secrets come to light.
episodes.title: For Pete's Sake

episodes.synopsis: Danny Rand insists on helping Luke hunt for Bushmaster -- the Iron Fist way. Mariah sets out to reclaim her empire. Misty pursues a traitor.
episodes.title: The Main Ingredient

episodes.synopsis: Shaken by Mariah's latest act, Luke combs the city for a witness. Flashbacks reveal a fateful encounter between the Stokes and McIver families.
episodes.title: The Creator

episodes.synopsis: Luke teams up with an unlikely ally to combat a new strain of heroin. As Shades plows ahead with his plan, a massive party draws everyone to the club.
episodes.title: Can't Front On Me

episodes.synopsis: Mariah adapts to her new circumstances and goes to extremes to cover her tracks. Luke takes a new approach to protecting Harlem.
episodes.title: They Reminisce Over You
